snippet: Angelique Kerber has overcome goose bumps and self-doubt, and is now one victory from becoming the first German woman since Steffi Graf in 1999 to advance to a women’s Grand Slam final.
abstract: Profile of Angelique Kerber, who has overcome goose bumps and self-doubt, and is now one victory from becoming the first German woman since Steffi Graf in 1999 to advance to a women’s Grand Slam final if she prevails at Wimbledon.
lead_paragraph: Angelique Kerber has overcome goose bumps and self-doubt, and is now one victory from becoming the first German woman since Steffi Graf in 1999 to advance to a women’s Grand Slam final.

headline.seo: 2012 Wimbledon — Kerber Is Suddenly in Demand
